item.title: Jagex has screwed the dfs
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Such a win thread…

Anyways , JaGeX COULD save RuneScape by adding more servers.
In NO WAY will this lead to new players ( we will maintain the current amount of players and the rate at which new players come to RS ).
This will lead to less crowded areas and servers and less lagg…

They have the money to do it , they just have to sacrifice what they work for

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex has screwed the dfs
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:32, topic:409857”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=511132.msg3711461#msg3711461 date=1313372813]
I can’t train f2p due to bots. WTF
[/quote]
IKR, F2p has actually turned into a trial version of p2p. There are however a few locations that are not crowded at all in f2p! Giant rats in Lumbridge swamp is a good place for pures, even though they will make you eat more food than you should at low levels.

PS. if they reset all accounts and items nothing’s going to change. The botters are still there, and I highly doubt legit players want to watch their earned skills and items gone.[/quote]

I really don’t care.
I just want to actually log on RS and play for more than 5 mins before I say fuck this.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex has screwed the dfs
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

IlikeArrays:

I can’t train f2p due to bots. WTF

IKR, F2p has actually turned into a trial version of p2p. There are however a few locations that are not crowded at all in f2p! Giant rats in Lumbridge swamp is a good place for pures, even though they will make you eat more food than you should at low levels.

PS. if they reset all accounts and items nothing’s going to change. The botters are still there, and I highly doubt legit players want to watch their earned skills and items gone.

Even for these little forums everything is backed up off-site.

[/quote]
In a flash drive in a tiny safe.[/quote]

item.title: Jagex has screwed the dfs
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:10, topic:409857”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=511132.msg3709237#msg3709237 date=1313246952]
The inevitability of a poorly controlled economy. There are far more dragon visages coming into the game than dragonfire shields leaving it.
[/quote]
So if some1 buys all of the dragonfire shields and logs off forever… success!!!

That brings up the question of where are the ancient accounts with 20 crackers and 10 of each phat on them because they where crazy cheap and practically worthless? One day, some of those people are going to remember their password, and phats are going to have a nice little price drop.[/quote]He can sell 1 every 4-5 days.
